title: Some time ago, on WAAV radio, I heard either a city council member or a county commissioner talking about plans to build a NEW meeting room/exercise gym with public money downtown, I THINK close to City Hall.  I would sure like to know the people who are planning to use public money at at time like this for a cause like this BEFORE elections.
